original_text: But as a wife that committeth adultery, which taketh strangers instead of her husband!
korean_text: 그 남편 대신에 다른 남자들과 내통하여 간음하는 아내로다

sentences.original_text: But as a wife that committeth adultery
which taketh strangers instead of her husband!
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 남편 대신 낯선 사람들을 받아들인다!
